document_data.mainbody:
erter was a renowned fletcher-merchant from the City of Coin, Athkatla, in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Galoomp was a portly man with light skin. He spoke politely in a proper manner and talked about himself in third person.
Perter shared a workshop with a fellow merchant and a smith named Arnolinus. Their store could be found in the grand market in Athkatlas Center District â€“ Waukeens Promenade in the . Some of the enchanted missiles Perter was creating at the time included arrows of biting, arrows of dispelling, arrows of fire, arrows of ice, and bolts of biting. He also carried a stock of mundane missile weapons, bows, and several potions of infravision and potions of strength.
